doc:
Margerie Bonner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margerie_Bonner 0 Margerie Bonner (February 17, 1905 – September 28, 1988) was an American actress, scriptwriter, and novelist. She is best known as the wife of Malcolm Lowry and for her support of the author while he wrote his best known novel, Under the Volcano, considered one of the finest novels of the 20th century. Margerie_Bonner ( February_17_,_1905 – September_28_,_1988 ) was an_American_actress , scriptwriter , and novelist . She is_best_known as the_wife of Malcolm_Lowry and for her_support of the_author while he wrote his_best known novel , Under the_Volcano , considered one of the_finest_novels of the_20th_century .
